scripts.test: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail  -n api-db,angular-app -c green,blue  'npm run -w api-db test' 'npm run -w angular-app test:headless'
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:schemas:dev && npm run -w api-db build:dev
scripts.dev: npm run build:dev && ( concurrently --kill-others -n api-db,angular-app -c green,blue  'npm run -w api-db dev' 'npm run -w angular-app start')
